name: Giant Panda
description: The giant panda is one of the world's most beloved and recognizable animals. Despite being classified as a carnivore, pandas have evolved to eat almost exclusively bamboo, spending 12-16 hours a day eating to meet their nutritional needs.
funFacts: Eats 26-84 pounds of bamboo per day
Has a pseudo-thumb to help grip bamboo stalks
Cubs are born pink, blind, and about the size of a stick of butter
Can live up to 30 years in captivity
Has one of the most restrictive diets of any mammal
